resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "title": {
                "type": "text",
                "store": True
            },
            "date": {
                "type": "date",
                "store": True
            },
            "content": {
                "type": "text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    document={
        "title": "Some short title",
        "date": "2015-01-01",
        "content": "A very long content field..."
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    stored_fields=[
        "title",
        "date"
    ],
)
print(resp2)
